title: The Girl with the Empty Suitcase
description: The suitcase sat at the top of Danielle’s closet for years, holding memories, promises, and undeveloped film. From struggling with homework, to her final farewells with her parents, this is the story of one woman’s life and loves. Through hopes and laughter, heartaches and tears, Danielle is shaped by the family, friends, and romances around her.This emotional story gives us a woman, a window through whom we may see our own realities, our own challenges, our own quiet triumphs.
author: Krysta MacDonald
